text: David Paul Greenfield (29 March 1949 â€“ 3 May 2020) was an English keyboardist and singer-songwriter. He was a member of rock band The Stranglers. He joined the band in 1975, and played with them for 45 years until his death. He was born in Brighton, East Sussex. Greenfield died on 3 May 2020 of heart failure caused by COVID-19, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English rock singers Category:British keyboardists Category:English rock musicians Category:Entertainers from Brighton Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:English singer-songwriters
title: Dave Greenfield
